title: Riot why would you do this!?!?!??!?!
body:
What a coinkydink riot. Maybe change this or just leave it idc just putting it out their! {{champion:107}} Rengar's e... Bola strike... E-bola, EBOLA!??!?(Found this ages ages ages ago just coulnd be bothered putting it up).  

 --------------- *Africa is mad with you*

replies.body: Oh Jesus Christ, I thought we were past this?

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=97gc5zE3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-22T10:29:31.134+0000)
>
> Oh Jesus Christ, I thought we were past this?

You cant act mature bby
But a *Bola* is a thing , have you seen a lasso? its like that but thrown (without a string)

> [{quoted}](name=ShuffledPancake,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=97gc5zE3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-22T10:15:15.161+0000)
>
> But a *Bola* is a thing , have you seen a lasso? its like that but thrown (without a string)

But yeah E-Bola to strongk
